dcterms:creator: Andrew Kachites McCallum
Kamal Nigam
Jason Rennie
Kristie Seymore
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset where nodes represent papers published in the field of computer science, features are bag-of-word vectors of the corresponding paper title, and edges represent citation relationships between two papers.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: C Lee Giles
Kurt D Bollacker
Steve Lawrence
dcterms:description: Citeseer is an automatic citation indexing system that provides a citation network dataset where nodes are papers and edges represent citation relationships.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: Hongbin Pei
Bingzhe Wei
Kevin Chen-Chuan Chang
Yu Lei
Bo Yang
dcterms:description: Chameleon is a dataset used for graph-based learning, particularly in the context of geometric graph convolutional networks.
dcterms:title: Chameleon

dcterms:creator: Benedek Rozemberczki
Carl Allen
Rik Sarkar
dcterms:description: Squirrel is a page-to-page network dataset on specific topics in Wikipedia pages, where nodes represent web pages and edges represent mutual links between two pages.
dcterms:title: Squirrel

dcterms:creator: Jie Tang
Jimeng Sun
Chi Wang
Zi Yang
dcterms:description: Actor is an actor-only induced subgraph of the film-director-actor-writer network, where each node corresponds to an actor and edges denote co-occurrence on the same Wikipedia page.
dcterms:title: Actor
